channel.title: Commodities on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Commodities on FinanClub

item.title: BTG
item.description: score:147 Chances: Mali’s industrial gold output is expected to drop by about 14% this year to 53.7 metric tons, which may indicate a potential decrease in global supply, leading to higher gold prices and increased revenue for B2Gold Corp. Investing in gold and other commodities could help mitigate the issue of major losses in uncertain market environments, providing a positive impact on B2Gold Corp.
